description: This file declares interfaces for calculating MD5 hashes, including functions to convert MD5 outputs to hexadecimal and to generate MD5 hashes from input data. It includes licensing information and references external crypto APIs.

methods.name: Convert2Hex
methods.description: Converts a binary MD5 digest into a hexadecimal string representation.

methods.name: ToMD5
methods.description: Generates an MD5 hash for the given password using the provided crypto object.
